verses.verse: Now Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> was a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> and he was the son <S%H1121><s%> of a prostitute: <S%H802><s%> and Gilead <S%H1568><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jephthah. <S%H3316><s%>

Gilead <S%H1568><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him sons; <S%H1121><s%> and when his wife <S%H802><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> grew up, <S%H1431><s%> they drove out <S%H1644><s%> Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5157><s%> "You shall not inherit in our father <S%H1><s%>'s house; <S%H1004><s%> for you are the son <S%H1121><s%> of another <S%H312><s%> woman. <S%H802><s%>"

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob: <S%H2897><s%> and there were gathered <S%H3950><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> fellows <S%H582><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> and they went out with him. <S%H3318><s%>
It happened after a while, <S%H3117><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> made war <S%H3898><s%> against Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

It was so, <S%H1121><s%> that when the children of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> made war <S%H3898><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to get <S%H3947><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob; <S%H2897><s%>
and they said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Come <S%H3212><s%> and be our chief, <S%H7101><s%> that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>"

Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> "Didn't <S%H8130><s%> you hate me, <S%H1644><s%> and drive me out of my father <S%H1><s%>'s house? <S%H1004><s%> Why have you come <S%H935><s%> to me now when you are in distress? <S%H6887><s%>"

The elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Therefore we have turned again <S%H7725><s%> to you now, <S%H1980><s%> that you may go with us, <S%H3898><s%> and fight with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%> and you shall be our head <S%H7218><s%> over all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>"

Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> "If you bring me home again <S%H7725><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H7218><s%> shall I be your head?"

The elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall be witness <S%H8085><s%> between us; <S%H1697><s%> surely according to your word so will we do. <S%H6213><s%>"

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> him head <S%H7218><s%> and chief <S%H7101><s%> over them: <S%H3316><s%> and Jephthah spoke <S%H1696><s%> all his words <S%H1697><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in Mizpah. <S%H4709><s%>

Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What have you to do with me, <S%H935><s%> that you have come to me to fight <S%H3898><s%> against my land? <S%H776><s%>"

The king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> to the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Because Israel <S%H3478><s%> took away <S%H3947><s%> my land, <S%H776><s%> when he came up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the Arnon <S%H769><s%> even to the Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> and to the Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> now therefore restore that territory again <S%H7725><s%> peaceably. <S%H7965><s%>"
Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

and he said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> "Thus says Jephthah: <S%H3316><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> didn't <S%H3947><s%> take away the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> nor the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%>

but when they came up <S%H5927><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Kadesh; <S%H6946><s%>

then Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5674><s%> 'Please let me pass through your land; <S%H776><s%>' but the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen. In the same way, <S%H7971><s%> he sent to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab; <S%H4124><s%> but he would <S%H14><s%> not: <S%H3478><s%> and Israel stayed <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>

Then they went through <S%H3212><s%> the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and went around <S%H5437><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> by the east side <S%H4217><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the Arnon; <S%H769><s%> but they didn't <S%H935><s%> come within the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> for the Arnon <S%H769><s%> was the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon; <S%H2809><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5674><s%> 'Please let us pass through your land <S%H776><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> my place. <S%H4725><s%>'

But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> didn't <S%H539><s%> trust Israel <S%H3478><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his border; <S%H1366><s%> but Sihon <S%H5511><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all his people <S%H5971><s%> together, <S%H622><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Jahaz, <S%H3096><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and all his people <S%H5971><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> them: <S%H3478><s%> so Israel possessed <S%H3423><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of that country. <S%H776><s%>

They possessed <S%H3423><s%> all the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> from the Arnon <S%H769><s%> even to the Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> and from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> even to the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

So now Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> has dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and should you possess them? <S%H3423><s%>

Won't <S%H3423><s%> you possess that which Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> your god <S%H430><s%> gives you to possess? <S%H3423><s%> So whoever Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> has dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> us, <S%H3423><s%> them will we possess.

Now are you anything better <S%H2896><s%> than Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor, <S%H6834><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab? <S%H4124><s%> Did he ever <S%H7378><s%> strive <S%H7378><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or did he ever <S%H7378><s%> fight against them? <S%H3898><s%>

While Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and in Aroer <S%H6177><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and in all the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are along by the side <S%H3027><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> why didn't <S%H5337><s%> you recover them within that time? <S%H6256><s%>

I therefore have not sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you, <S%H6213><s%> but you do me wrong <S%H7451><s%> to war <S%H3898><s%> against me. <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, the Judge, <S%H8199><s%> be judge <S%H8199><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> between the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>"
However the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the words <S%H1697><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> which he sent him. <S%H7971><s%>

Then the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came on Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> and he passed over <S%H5674><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and passed over <S%H5674><s%> Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and from Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> he passed over <S%H5674><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "If you will indeed <S%H5414><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> into my hand, <S%H3027><s%>

then it shall be, <S%H3318><s%> that whatever comes forth <S%H3318><s%> from the doors <S%H1817><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> me, <S%H7725><s%> when I return in peace <S%H7965><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> it shall be Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s, and I will offer it up <S%H5927><s%> for a burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>"

So Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against them; <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

He struck <S%H5221><s%> them from Aroer <S%H6177><s%> until you come <S%H935><s%> to Minnith, <S%H4511><s%> even twenty <S%H6242><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and to <S%H58><s%> Abelcheramim, <S%H3754><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter. <S%H4347><s%> So the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> to his house; <S%H1004><s%> and behold, <S%H1323><s%> his daughter came out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him with tambourines <S%H8596><s%> and with dances: <S%H4246><s%> and she was his only child; <S%H3173><s%> besides her he had neither son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H176><s%> daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

It happened, <S%H7200><s%> when he saw her, <S%H7167><s%> that he tore his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H162><s%> my daughter! <S%H1323><s%> You have brought <S%H3766><s%> me very <S%H3766><s%> low, <S%H3766><s%> and you are one of those who trouble <S%H5916><s%> me; <S%H6475><s%> for I have opened my mouth <S%H6310><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and I can't <S%H3201><s%> go back. <S%H7725><s%>"

She said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H1><s%> "My father, you have opened <S%H6475><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to me according to that which <S%H834><s%> has proceeded <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> because <S%H310><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has taken <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> for you on your enemies, <S%H341><s%> even on the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>"

She said <S%H559><s%> to her father, <S%H1><s%> "Let this thing <S%H1697><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%> for me: <S%H7503><s%> let me alone two <S%H8147><s%> months, <S%H2320><s%> that I may depart <S%H3212><s%> and go down <S%H3381><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and bewail <S%H1058><s%> my virginity, <S%H1331><s%> I and my companions. <S%H7464><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Go. <S%H3212><s%>" He sent her away <S%H7971><s%> for two <S%H8147><s%> months: <S%H2320><s%> and she departed, <S%H3212><s%> she and her companions, <S%H7464><s%> and mourned <S%H1058><s%> her virginity <S%H1331><s%> on the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>

It happened at the end <S%H7093><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> months, <S%H2320><s%> that she returned <S%H7725><s%> to her father, <S%H1><s%> who did <S%H6213><s%> with her according to his vow <S%H5088><s%> which he had vowed: <S%H5087><s%> and she was a virgin. <S%H3045><s%> <S%H376><s%> It was a custom <S%H2706><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

that the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> yearly <S%H3117><s%> to celebrate <S%H8567><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> four <S%H702><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in a year. <S%H8141><s%>
